actiongroups_externalid.description: action groups resource id to receive email notifications.

properties.description: Azure Service Retirements due date soon which needs your review and planning for remediation

allOf.query:
arg("").advisorresources
| where type == "microsoft.advisor/recommendations"
| extend props = todynamic(properties)
| where tostring(props.extendedProperties.recommendationSubCategory) == "ServiceUpgradeAndRetirement"
| extend
    RetirementFeature = tostring(props.extendedProperties.retirementFeatureName),
    RetirementDate = todatetime(strcat(tostring(props.extendedProperties.retirementDate))),
    Impact = tostring(props.impact),
    ResourceId = tostring(props.resourceMetadata.resourceId),
    ResourceType = tostring(props.impactedField),
    Problem = tostring(props.shortDescription.problem),
    Solution = tostring(props.shortDescription.solution),
    LastUpdated = todatetime(props.lastUpdated)
| extend
    ResourceName = iff(
                   isempty(ResourceId),
                   "Platform-wide",
                   tostring(split(ResourceId, "/")[-1])
               )
| where RetirementFeature != ""
| where RetirementDate between (now()-730d .. now()+180d)
| project
subscriptionId,
ResourceName,
ResourceType,
RetirementFeature,
RetirementDate,
Impact,
Problem,
Solution,
ResourceId,
LastUpdated
| order by RetirementDate asc

actionProperties.Email.Subject: Azure Service Retirements due date soon for your review and planning
